sk1.name: Lucent Beam
sk1.desc: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.

sk2.name: Moon Glaive
sk2.desc: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.

sk3.name: Lunar Blessing
sk3.desc: Grants bonus damage to nearby allied heroes, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.

sk4.name: Eclipse
sk4.desc: Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam. A single target can only be hit a maximum number of times. Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
